description:
The students from Class 3 are fighting hard to sell their CDs. That`s when the world`s most adorbs otokonoko idol appears before them, POP`N STAR`s Hanabusa Kokoro. After having their various inadequacies pointed out to them, the students of Class 3 declare that, on stage, they won`t be beaten by anyone. Kokoro invites them to open at his upcoming solo live concert.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In the Case of an Otokonoko
